an2.200-204:1: "Bhikkhus, these two qualities lead to the decline of a bhikkhu who is a trainee. What two? (200) Anger and hostility … (20) Denigration and insolence … (202) Envy and miserliness … (203) Deceitfulness and craftiness … (204) Moral shamelessness and moral recklessness. These two qualities lead to the decline of a bhikkhu who is a trainee."
